title: Will Riot Moderate player contracts?
body:
Now I remember a couple of weeks back I saw maybe a post or video from dot esports about riot will moderate player contracts.
assuming eg. Competitive rulings on behaviour, cheating , unsportsmanlike conduct, breach of contract and so forth. 

I think that applies to OPL and OCS as players sign a contract to Riot in those leagues.

I was wondering if they were looking to do that in Oceanic Open Ladder as contracts are becoming more prevalent in that league.

Could I potentially hear back from someone to whether or not this would be a possibility.
Or has riot just not considered it yet.?

replies.body:
Hey Wolves,

We still have a way to go on leveling up player contracts.. Currently though, the OOL is pretty much out of the question for the foreseeable future. There is simply too much work to do on the OPL and OCS before we delve deeper than that {{summoner:3}}
Thanks for clearing that up Belquin
